channel.title: Proxmox as Code on Mike Webb Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Proxmox as Code on Mike Webb Tech

item.title: Iot (art 3)
item.description: My journey with Hugo is just beginning, and I’m excited to explore its more advanced features, such as shortcodes for embedding dynamic content and data- driven pages. For now, I’m incredibly satisfied with its speed, simplicity, and the control it gives me over my blog’s presentation.
